name: Transaction Set Response Trailer
purpose: To acknowledge acceptance or rejection and report errors in a transaction set

elements.name: Transaction Set Acknowledgment Code
elements.description: Code indicating accept or reject condition based on the syntax edits

codes.description: Rejected, content after decryption could not be analyzed

elements.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
elements.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

codes.description: Transaction set control number in header and trailer do not match
Number of included segments does not match actual count
One or more segments in error
Missing or invalid transaction set identifier
Missing or invalid transaction set control number
